Well, to be a goob scuele of the before
I'm trying my best to enjoy vore.... but it's not good for me yet... damn it dick. Why are you so lame?
I buy and support Taku on DLSite and never would've found his work without sites like this one

Just a reminder, Taku has specifically asked that his books not be posted on sites like these anymore. Now that it's up there's not much that can really be done anymore, but please make sure to actually buy the book if you enjoy it.

Also, please remember to not kink shame vore fans, thank you :)
